contexts.context: ...he didn't rustle a leaf with his pace. In a <mark>flash</mark>, Vanis was dead by Baranat's hands. The adventurer continued...
...stepped into. A trap with no escape. With three quick <mark>flashes</mark> of his hand, Baranat completed the Cycle of Blood,...
...admirers ask, "Arnie, how can I become a <mark>flash</mark> and prosperous fellow like you?"
